name: defra-hapi-change-answers
description: Hapi plugin to deal with changing answers within a defra hapi web application
author: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

scripts.unit-test: ./node_modules/.bin/lab --coverage --reporter console --output stdout --reporter lcov --output lcov.info --reporter html --output coverage.html --verbose
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test
